comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic appeared in the Sydney Mail, 19/12/1906 (pp. 1576-1577) in a feature article on the 1906 Sydney Mail/Sydney Morning Herald Prize Farm Competition...this issue of the SM isn't currently available via Google News Archive...my source is the microfilm copy. The pic was evidently taken at F.C. Rowlands' farm, 'Werribee', at Waugoola, between Lyndhurst and Cowra in NSW. Rowlands was placed second in the 1906 Prize Farm Competition. The Sydney Mail caption is 'Amongst the Stooks'. Also see these other pics from the PHM Tyrrell Collection, which appeared in this SM article: www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2362683483/ www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2447225367/
